scripts.sendToLambda: aws s3 cp function.zip s3://nermin99bucket && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name puppeteer-on-lambda --s3-bucket nermin99bucket --s3-key function.zip
scripts.updateLambda: npm run zip3 && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name malartag-scraper --zip-file fileb://function.zip
